member.summary: Gets or sets the first line of the address.

member.summary: Gets or sets the fourth line of the address.

member.name: P:Sitecore.XConnect.Collection.Model.Address.City
member.summary: Gets or sets the city of the address.

member.name: P:Sitecore.XConnect.Collection.Model.Address.CountryCode
member.summary: Gets or sets the 2-digit ISO code from ISO 3166-alpha-2 for the country. Using this code enables marketers to easily build segments with our conditions by using an existing standard.

member.name: P:Sitecore.XConnect.Collection.Model.Address.GeoCoordinate
member.summary: Gets or sets the geographic coordinates for the address. The value is optional. The brand must decide if they populate and therefore use this value..

member.name: P:Sitecore.XConnect.Collection.Model.Address.PostalCode
member.summary: Gets or sets the zip or postal code of the address.

member.name: P:Sitecore.XConnect.Collection.Model.Address.StateOrProvince
member.summary: Gets or sets the state of province of the address.

member.name: T:Sitecore.XConnect.Collection.Model.AddressList
member.summary: Represents a list of addresses for a contact.

member.summary: Constructs a new AddressList object.

member.name: P:Sitecore.XConnect.Collection.Model.AddressList.Others
member.summary: Gets or sets the alternative addresses for this contact different than the preferred one. The key defines the identifier for that address. Examples are "work", "home", or "personal".

member.name: P:Sitecore.XConnect.Collection.Model.AddressList.PreferredKey
member.summary: Gets or sets the key related to the preferred address.

member.summary: Gets or sets the preferred email for the contact.

member.name: T:Sitecore.XConnect.Collection.Model.AutomationPlanActivityEnrollmentCacheEntry
member.summary: An entry of the cache of the of the automation plans for this contact. This is only to be updated during automation plan processing and used for personalization.

member.name: P:Sitecore.XConnect.Collection.Model.AutomationPlanActivityEnrollmentCacheEntry.ActivityId
member.summary: Gets or sets the ID of the activity the contact is enrolled in.

member.name: P:Sitecore.XConnect.Collection.Model.AutomationPlanActivityEnrollmentCacheEntry.AutomationPlanDefinitionId
member.summary: Gets or sets the automation plan definition ID from the marketing operations API

member.name: P:Sitecore.XConnect.Collection.Model.AutomationPlanActivityEnrollmentCacheEntry.ContextKey
member.summary: Gets or sets the context key. The context key is the same one which specifies an instance of the plan and enables a developer to look up additional details for the plan instance from the MarketingAutomationClient.

member.name: P:Sitecore.XConnect.Collection.Model.AutomationPlanActivityEnrollmentCacheEntry.ActivityEntryDate
member.summary: Gets or sets the date and time when the contact entered the ActivityId.

member.name: P:Sitecore.XConnect.Collection.Model.AutomationPlanActivityEnrollmentCacheEntry.PlanEntryDate
member.summary: Gets or sets the date and time when the contact first entered the PlanId.

member.name: P:Sitecore.XConnect.Collection.Model.AutomationPlanActivityEnrollmentCacheEntry.CustomValues
member.summary: Gets or sets the custom values the contact is enrolled into the activity with.

member.name: T:Sitecore.XConnect.Collection.Model.AutomationPlanEnrollmentCache
member.summary: A cache of the of the automation plans for this contact. This is only to be updated during automation plan processing and used for personalization. The context key is the same one which specifies an instance of the plan and enables a developer to look up additional details for the plan instance from the MarketingAutomationClient

member.summary: The ID of the campaign event's definition.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class. All campaigns have /sitecore/system/Settings/Analytics/Page Events/Campaign definition ID.

member.summary: Gets or sets the Campaign Definition ID.

member.name: P:Sitecore.XConnect.Collection.Model.ConsentInformation.ConsentRevoked
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the contact has revoked their consent to be contacted by the brand in any form.

member.name: P:Sitecore.XConnect.Collection.Model.ConsentInformation.DoNotMarket
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the contact has globally unsubscribed from all marketing lists. This does not include system messages such as order confirmation or "your password is about to expire".
member.value: true if [do not market]; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Sitecore.XConnect.Collection.Model.ConsentInformation.ExecutedRightToBeForgotten
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the contact has executed the right to be forgotten.
member.value: true if executed right to be forgotten; otherwise, false.

member.summary: Gets or sets when this contact list membership was added

member.name: P:Sitecore.XConnect.Collection.Model.ContactListSubscription.IsActive
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this list membership is active.
member.value: true if this membersship is active; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Sitecore.XConnect.Collection.Model.ContactListSubscription.ListDefinitionId
member.summary: Gets or sets the Id of the contact list to which the contact has subscribed. This Id is defined by the ContactListDefinitionManager found in the Marketing Operations API.

member.summary: Gets or sets the definition ID for the source of this subscription, if any.

member.name: T:Sitecore.XConnect.Collection.Model.Avatar
member.summary: A thumbnail photo of the contact.
member.remarks: Note, loading this with a large payload can slow the load time of contact data when requesting this facet. This is primarily designed to be a standard sized thumbnail of the contact.
